title: Caritas Austria, FACES Pakistan dispatch relief goods for flood victims
dc:creator: admin
description:
LAHORE: FACES Pakistan and Caritas Austria, in a simple ceremony, dispatched a truck full of relief goods for the flood affectees. On this occasion, FACES Pakistan President Javed William said that the relief truck has ration bags, tents, and mosquito nets containing essential items for 100 families. He said that before this most of the work regarding relief was done in Sanghar, Nowshera, Pashteen and DG Khan, etc by the FACES Pakistan and Caritas Austria. He also appealed to the entire nation to help their brothers and sisters in their hour of sorrow. Expressing their views, Caritas representatives Andreas and

The post Caritas Austria, FACES Pakistan dispatch relief goods for flood victims appeared first on the Wallet.
